title: HOUR 1- Chris Mannix 081420
itunes:title: HOUR 1- Chris Mannix 081420
description:
Chris Mannix tries to defend his early prediction that the Lakers would not make the playoffs. Chris says its a tough call as to weather Gregg Popovich will coach again. Chris thinks that Popovich will coach the Olympics then ride off into the sunset.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
